title: [K-12] Branched Interactive Video-Based Learning of Core Biology Concepts

context.prior_knowledge: High school-level biology basics and fundamental understanding of protein synthesis processes
context.additional_context: A classroom environment enabling smartphone-based video viewing, with real-time feedback via formative assessments.

learning_goals: Through branching video simulations, learners can explain core concepts of each cell division stage with ≥80% accuracy
Learners correctly select experimental variables in the protein purification process ≥3 times using decision points within videos
Based on interactive activity outcomes, learners present ≥2 biological problem-solving strategies

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
